group_1.textLeft: At first I hated going, because I'd@have to see all the guys I played with.
Yeah, I hadn't seen them in a while,@since I quit playing...
But then I had to watch them play...@On the same field I wasn't allowed on...
I would actually get upset@watching them play out there.

group_1.textRight: Yeah... Yeah, I get that.@Of course you'd feel that way.

group_1.textLeft: But there was more to it than that...

group_1.textCenter: Come on, hit it!@Don't let 'im scare you!
Go go go go go go, RUUUN!

group_1.textLeft: Before I knew it, I was cheering@for anyone and everyone.
And I didn't have to be@on the field to do it, either.
Eventually I realized I was having @more fun cheering than playing.
That was when it hit me.
What I cared about was way@more than just playing baseball.
More than anything, I just wanted@to be part of a team, you know?
And I wanted to help that team@do everything they could to win.
At first, I wasn't sure if screaming your@head off from the sidelines counted.
Would everyone really see@me as being a part of the team?
I had a lot of questions, really.
But people started complimenting me...
Saying things like "We wouldn't have@won if it weren't for your cheering!"
And that just made me feel great!
It gave me the boost I needed...
So I decided to just keep doing it.@I wanted to help out any way I could.

group_1.textRight: I knew my brother was a good person,@but it showed the rest of them were, too.

group_1.textLeft: And I'm lucky to have them as friends.

group_1.textRight: When you've got a team,@everything feels worth it...

group_1.textLeft: See! You get it, too.

group_1.textRight: But to tell you the truth... @I don't think about big things too much...
Like defeating Witches, or@saving the world, you know.
So... @I don't have any big goals, really...
Or at least, not when it comes to@being a Magical Girl.
When I'm with Rena—[chara:101101:motion_000]I mean, my team... @When all three of us work together...
It feels, I dunno...@Like it's all worth fighting for...
At least, that's how it feels to me...
No, what you said was awesome.
I'm just a little jealous of your teammates@having such a sweet girl on their side.

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, I feel the same way you do, Kaede.
Whether it's fighting as a Magical Girl,@or playing some baseball...
It's always better with friends.
